title: Concretizer fails to constrain python version

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Since the preferred version of `python` was changed, `gaudi`, a package that requires `python@:3.7.99` fails to concretize. Putting the python version `3.7.8` in my `packages.yaml` is my current workaround, but the concretizer should be able to handle this, I think!

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack spec gaudi

```
